title: Vitamins in Human Body
summary: Essential micronutrients required for normal metabolic function.
details: Vitamins are vital for energy production, immune defense, and cellular repair.

children.title: Vitamin Classification
children.details: Vitamins are classified as fat-soluble or water-soluble.

children.title: Fat-Soluble Vitamins
children.details: Includes vitamins A, D, E, and K.

children.title: Key Bodily Roles
children.details: Support metabolism, immunity, bone health, and energy production.
